articles.title: Foreign investors cut stake in most Adani Group companies in the September quarter - CNBCTV18
articles.description: Adani Group stocks have been under pressure recently with their overall group market capitalisation falling below the Rs 10 lakh crore mark on Monday for the first time since May this year.
